subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Poor play by the Wildcats could keep the team from making the N.C.A.A. tournament, a year after they won it all. Kentucky Coach John Calipari blamed himself.
snippet: Poor play by the Wildcats could keep the team from making the N.C.A.A. tournament, a year after they won it all. Kentucky Coach John Calipari blamed himself.
